sentences.en: Brawny: Used to describe wines that are hard, intense, tannic and that have raw , woody flavors.
sentences.cn: 强壮的: 用于形容葡萄酒坚硬, 强烈, 单宁明鲜且具有生的, 木头风味.

sentences.en: Do you like your boyfriend brawny or brainy?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢你的男朋友体格健壮还是头脑聪明?

sentences.en: He was a great brawny brute of a man.
sentences.cn: 他是个魁梧壮实、粗野的人。

sentences.en: He was big and brawny with soulless eyes.
sentences.cn: 他身材高大，肌肉发达，一双眼睛冷漠无情。

sentences.en: His brawny arms are very strong.
sentences.cn: 他那肌肉发达的手臂十分有力.

sentences.en: His brawny arms glistened with sweat.
sentences.cn: 他强壮的胳膊上有亮晶晶的汗水。

sentences.en: She ups with her brawny arm.
sentences.cn: 她举起了自己强壮的手臂.

sentences.en: Success will mean the difference between a brawny giant and a blubbery one.
sentences.cn: 而成功决定是“肌肉发达的巨人”还是“哭泣的巨人”.

sentences.en: Suddenly two brawny policemen were beside Nim.
sentences.cn: 突然间,尼姆身旁闪出两名身强力壮的警察.

sentences.en: That same afternoon the marshal appeared with two brawny assistants.
sentences.cn: 当天下午,警长带着两名身强力壮的助手来了.

sentences.en: The bine is erect, brawny, circular much edges and corners, by white thick bristle.
sentences.cn: 茎竖立, 粗壮, 圆形多棱角, 被白色粗硬毛.

sentences.en: The bine is straight and brawny, have white thick bristle.
sentences.cn: 茎直而粗壮, 有白色粗硬毛.

sentences.en: The blacksmith has a brawny arm.

sentences.cn: 那个铁匠的臂膀很健壮.

sentences.en: The brawny big tree had cast a deep impression in my mind.
sentences.cn: 古枫树那粗壮厚实的身影已深深地印在我的脑海里.

sentences.en: The muscles of his brawny arms are as strong as iron bands.
sentences.cn: 他强壮的手臂上的肌肉像铁铸的带条一样.

words.tran_cn: 发达的肌肉；膂力；腌制好的野猪肉

trans.tran_cn: <非正>健壮的，肌肉发达的，严重肿胀的，顽强的
